data.title: Official tourism information for St. Catharines
data.meta_description: Visit St. Catharines. loveSTC is the official website for travel and tourism information for St. Catharines, Ontario, the heart of Niagara.
data.text:
Things to do this August

in St. Catharines

Emancipation Day celebrations, the World Rowing CHampionships, a world-premier from Canada’s most prolific playwright Norm Foster, Buskerfest and so much more, August in St. Catharines is packed with fun things to do for the whole family.

Read the list

Sun’s out, patios out!

As sunscreen and sandals become daily essentials, St. Catharines’ restaurants, pubs and wineries are transforming their outdoor spaces into must-go spots for delicious food, refreshing drinks and summer vibes. Here’s our guide to outdoor dining at its finest.

Patios in St. Catharines

Historic by nature and so much to do: it’s easy to find your next adventure in St. Catharines. The Toronto Star described St. Catharines as ‘full of surprises’ and we completely agree. Rediscover St. Catharines and see for yourself, all there is to love.

Welcome to the Official Tourism St. Catharines website. Dedicated to providing up-to-date tourism information including accommodations, dining, events and more for visitors, travel trade and other interested individuals.
